title: 📖 Study Vault
text:
内容仅供个人学习使用，转载及商业使用须邮件申请并取得书面许可
这里是一些武汉大学数理金融的学习笔记，供同学们参考。 内容包括数理金融的部分专必、专选以及我在耶鲁大学学习期间的部分课程笔记及作业。
受限于网页制作时间，此处仅挑选部分质量较高的展示。如需其他资料（如课本、课件、答案等），欢迎邮件联系。
如有疑问或错误反馈，请邮件联系，谢谢。
网页持续更新中   Latest update: Aug 12, 2025

Game Theory

title: Haiyang Gao
text:
I am a final-year undergraduate student at the Hongyi Honor College, Wuhan University, majoring in Mathematical Finance. In the 2024–2025 academic year, I studied Sports Management and Business Analytics under the supervision of Dr. Lorena Martin at the University of Southern California. In the summer of 2025, I attended the Yale Summer Session, where I took courses in Game Theory and Data Science.
My academic training has given me a broad foundation in microeconomics, macroeconomics, econometrics, behavioral economics, game theory, market equilibrium theory, statistics, stochastic analysis, numerical analysis, and data science. I am particularly interested in leveraging data science techniques — including machine learning and natural language processing — together with financial theory to rigorously investigate the degree of market rationality in China, a topic I believe is underexplored but of great importance for improving the market environment. In addition, inspired by Dr. Martin’s course and my own passion for badminton, I aim to conduct interdisciplinary research at the intersection of data science and sports, with a focus on injury prevention, career longevity, and competition scheduling optimization in professional badminton. My long-term goal is to provide evidence-based recommendations for organizations such as the Badminton World Federation (BWF) to balance athlete health with audience engagement.
I have served as a teaching assistant for a Game Theory course (2024–2025), published the 2024 Annual Report on China’s Green Credit Market in Modern Commercial Bank (2025), and participated in seminar discussions on industrial organization theory in Professor Bo Shen’s research group.

Key topics

Mathematical Finance
Data Science
Sports Management



Education

BSc Mathematical Finance - Wuhan University, Hongyi Honor College （2022-present）
